entry.def: You use hideously to emphasize that something is very ugly or unattractive.

example.ex: He has been left hideously disfigured by plastic surgery.
example.tran: 整形外科手术导致他完全毁容了。

entry.tran: 令人无法接受地;极其恶劣地
entry.def: You can use hideously to emphasize that something is very unpleasant or unacceptable.

example.ex: ...a simple but undoubtedly hideously expensive black suit.
example.tran: 款式简单但无疑又贵得离谱的黑色套装
